project

Class MasterClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.MasterClass

  • public class MasterClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the master class that handles all transactions and popups the applications displays. It keeps track of who is logged on, if they are a seller, and manages the cart, the product list,seller list, and checkout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MasterClass()
      Default Constructor that initializes the lists, popups, and the cart

        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to be added to the shopping cart

        Returns:
